Class ViewFactory

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for EntityView objects with cache

                                  EntityModel model)
        Gets from the entities cache the entity being managed.
        Parameters:
        game - The current game session.
        model - The current Entity being managed.
        Returns:

      • makeView

        Gets from the Shapes cache the shape being managed.
        Parameters:
        model - The shape model that is being managed.
        Returns:
        The Shape view corresponding to the shape model given.
